scripts.localization_extract_formatjs_default: NAO USAR, esta aqui so de referencia usar o script 1_localization_extrair_ids_babelfishoucrowdin.sh formatjs extract 'src/**/*.{ts,js,tsx,jsx}' --out-file src/locales/raw_locales/extracted_formatjs.json --id-interpolation-pattern '[sha512:contenthash:base64:6]' && jq -s '.[0] * .[1]' src/locales/raw_locales/en.json src/locales/raw_locales/extracted_formatjs.json > src/locales/raw_locales/merged.json && cp src/locales/raw_locales/merged.json src/locales/raw_locales/en.json
scripts.localization_extract_crowdin: NAO USAR, esta aqui so de referencia usar o script 1_localization_extrair_ids_babelfishoucrowdin.sh formatjs extract 'src/**/*.{ts,js,tsx,jsx}' --out-file temporary_locales/extracted_crowdin.json --format crowdin
scripts.localization_extract_lokalise: NAO USAR, esta aqui so de referencia usar o script 1_localization_extrair_ids_babelfishoucrowdin.sh formatjs extract 'src/**/*.{ts,js,tsx,jsx}' --out-file temporary_locales/extracted_lokalise.json --format lokalise
scripts.localization_extract_phrase_lingohub_sim: NAO USAR, esta aqui so de referencia usar o script 1_localization_extrair_ids_babelfishoucrowdin.sh formatjs extract 'src/**/*.{ts,js,tsx,jsx}' --out-file temporary_locales/extracted_simple.json --format simple
scripts.localization_compile: NAO USAR, esta aqui so de referencia usar o script 2_localization_compilar_linguas formatjs compile src/locales/raw_locales/en.json --ast --out-file src/locales/compiled_locales/en.json
